name: Hotel Bristol Berlin
description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Bristol Berlin! To save at this property, all you have to do is .Hotel Bristol Berlin is a vibrant, legendary hotel located directly on the famous Kurfürstendamm boulevard, opening its doors in 1952. The hotel offers complimentary WiFi throughout the premises and there is a nearby underground parking garage.The hotel's rooms and suites are spread across several main floors plus an 11-story tower. All rooms are a stylistic mix of classic and modern with tiltable and soundproof windows. The hotel is now 100% nonsmoking.The wellness area in Roman-Greek style has a heated 50 feet pool, sauna, infrared cabin and steam room with a cold water plunge pool.Enjoy the best seasonal martinis at the Bristol Bar, or cozy up at the Bristol Café. And you will still have legendary Crêpes Suzettes flambéed at your table at the well-loved Bristol Grill, which serves traditional German-French cuisine with the occasional modern twist.Nearby attractions include the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church, Savigny Square, Theater des Westens, the BIKINI Berlin concept mall and The Story of Berlin interactive museum. Attractions for families includes the nearby zoo and aquarium, and the Tiergarten, Berlin's largest park, is just a 10-minute walk from the Hotel Bristol Berlin.

The property provides a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage for guests.All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower. At Motel One Köln-Neumarkt the rooms come with bed linen and towels.Continental and buffet breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation.Popular points of interest near Motel One Köln-Neumarkt include Theater am Dom, National Socialism Documentation Center and Saint Gereon's Basilica. The nearest airport is Cologne Bonn Airport, 10 miles from the hotel.

name: Pullman Cologne
description: This 4-star superior hotel offers quiet rooms in Cologne’s shopping district, a 10-minute walk from Cologne Cathedral.  The Pullman Cologne offers a luxury spa and spacious rooms with modern design.The elegant rooms at the Hotel Pullman Cologne include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a modern bathroom with a bath and shower. High-speed internet is available for a daily charge, and WiFi is provided free of charge in public areas.Guests at the Pullman are welcome to relax in the brasserie e.l.f. with summer terrace. LAB12 is the in-house bar inspired by perfume here in Cologne, the city of fragrances, and it serves aromatic drinks.The spa includes a sauna, a steam room, a gym, and massage treatments are also available.Underground parking is available at the Pullman Hotel Cologne. It is 1,300 feet from Friesenplatz Underground Station, just 2 stops from Cologne Main Station.

name: Scandic Frankfurt Museumsufer
description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Scandic Frankfurt Museumsufer! To save at this property, all you have to do is .This eco-friendly hotel is located 1,950 feet away from the main train station and the Museumsufer in the center of Frankfurt am Main.The Scandic Frankfurt Museumsufer features a modern design and free WiFi. The spacious rooms at the hotel offer a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator, an air-conditioning system and a coffee maker. Every room has wooden floors and a modern bathroom with bath or shower. name: Roomers
description: Less than 5 minutes’ walk from Frankfurt Central Station and the River Main, Roomers offers elegant rooms and free WiFi throughout the property. Guests have access to a modern, top-floor spa and an international restaurant.The Roomer’s stylish rooms feature dark wooden furniture and warm color schemes. All include a marble bathroom, a Bluetooth sound box, and flat-screen TV with Sky channels.Overlooking Frankfurt’s skyline, the Roomers’s spa has a designer sauna, a steam bath, a whirlpool and a well-equipped fitness area, and a roof terrace and sky lounge are available as well. Massages and cosmetic treatments can also be booked.The daily buffet breakfast includes international classics and specialties from the Levante region. The hotel restaurant serves international dishes with a focus on grills, and drinks are offered at the award-winning Roomers Bar (smoking bar). A candy bar is featured as well. In summer, drinks and meals are served on the terrace.

name: 25hours Hotel The Circle
description: Featuring a bar, 25hours Hotel The Circle is located in Cologne in the Nordrhein-Westfalen region, an 8-minute walk from National Socialism Documentation Center and half a mile from Saint Gereon's Basilica. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms.The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guest rooms in 25hours Hotel The Circle are equipped with a hairdryer and an iPod docking station.The accommodation offers a buffet or American breakfast.25hours Hotel The Circle has a sun terrace.Popular points of interest near the hotel include Cologne Cathedral, Theater am Dom and Museum Ludwig. The nearest airport is Cologne Bonn Airport, 11 miles from 25hours Hotel The Circle.

name: Le Méridien Frankfurt
description: Centrally located in Frankfurt, only 500 feet away from Frankfurt's Main Station, Le Méridien Frankfurt offers stylish accommodations with spa facilities, which is just a 15-minute walk from the Old Town and Frankfurt Exhibition Center.The Le Méridien Frankfurt offers elegant, air-conditioned rooms and suites, which are spread throughout 2 separate buildings: the Palais wing and the modern Legacy wing. All rooms and suites come with a complimentary bottle of water and free WiFi access. All suites also feature a coffee machine.An extensive breakfast buffet is available as early as 07:00 and remains until 10:30. Traditional and unusual dishes are on the modern menu at The Legacy Bar & Grill. Gourmet diners will enjoy the BBQ and smoked delicacies as well as the expert cocktail creations, carefully selected wines, and local craft beers.The Le Méridien's fitness area includes a gym, sauna and steam room. The gym featuring state of the art machines, natural day light and a summer terrace, is accessible 24/7 with the room key. A range of beauty treatments are also available in the spa. Guests can also enjoy free access to art exhibitions.The Frankfurt am Main Airport is reachable by train within 15 minutes.
